# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. This remarkable item is worth an incredible $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its exceptional quality and unique features. Considering its immense value, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, a generous discount that I hope will make this opportunity even more appealing.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am confident that it will meet and exceed your expectations, contributing to the growth and success of your endeavors.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
